column5: can someone give me website for Canada (Ontario) weather please? I had one on my "favorites" list, but my wife thought I didn't need it and deleted it, and I cannot remember the name. Thanks.
Here's a link to the Enviroment Canada site, very comprehensive.http://www.weatheroffice.ec.gc.ca/canada_e.html
Here's a good one, gives wind, etc.http://www.wunderground.com/cgi-bin/...=baudette%2Cmn
Here's one with a bit of ease of navigation..www.theweathernetwork.com

This is the one I use. We fish about 15" east of Dryden so I go to this site many times during the year...winter and summer. Note the expected low.....-29C (about -20F) next week.http://weatheroffice.ec.gc.ca/forecast/city_e.html?yhd
